article_title: Congressional candidates making final push before state’s June 7 primary
article_text:
San Luis Obispo County residents began receiving mail-in ballots this past week

Field of nine candidates are seeking to succeed nine-term Democratic Rep. Lois Capps

California’s open primary could advance two candidates from the same political party to the Nov. 4 general election

article_metadata.news-keywords: congress, house of representatives, 24th district, election, june, primary, lois capps, achadjian, carbajal, fareed, isakson, kokkonen, lucas, ostrander, schneider, uebersax
article_metadata.description: As sample ballot booklets begin arriving in San Luis Obispo County mailboxes, the nine people running for the 24th Congressional District seat being vacated by retiring Rep. Lois Capps are preparing for the June primary election.
article_metadata.title: Congressional candidates making final push before state’s June 7 primary | The Tribune
